reviews.review:
[h1]Pros+[/h1]
-Runs on a potato
-Fun multiplayer, or solo.
-Hundreds of different maps to play on!
-Different, modes such as, beginner, normal, etc.
-Choose length of match!

[h1]Cons-[/h1]
-Internet servers pretty much, dead.
-Same boss every time.
-Gets boring without, and co-op.
Not worth playing now the sequel has arrived and killed its playerbase, and was very shallow all things considered, but gritty enough to hold my interest despite a very repetitive flow.

This game is great but it has a problem that it says i have an unrecognised processor, even though i have 80 hours on the game. If anyone knows how i could fix this, please message me.

[h1]Pros:[/h1]
[list]
[*]One of the better co-op experiences on PC. Great for LAN parties.
[*]Enough weapons and maps to keep the game fresh for a lot of playtime.
[*]Even after all this time it still has a great community behind it.
[/list]

[h1]Neutral:[/h1]
[list]
[*]DLC is overpriced, but it's not like you need to buy it.
[/list]

[h1]Cons:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Graphics - When the game came out the graphics were just "meh". It hasn't aged well at all. That being said it doesn't really detract from the game in any meaningful way.
[*]Load times.
[/list]
The custom maps are fun, too.

Great game coupled with the shittiest load time since a cassette loading pograms on an Amiga. WTF, are little code gerbils inside my comouter rewriting the program every time I boot it up? Please fix it and maybe I'll buy one of your overpriced cosmetic packs. Great game play though!
One of the best game I ever play with friends.

No es necesario poner 20 parrafos para describir este juego....
Matar, Matar, Corre, Matar, Recargar, Equipar, Comprar, Matar y Matar.
20/10

I only recently have gotten into this game, but I've already fallen in love with it. Each Zed feels unique and threatening in their own way, even clots can mess you up if you get swarmed by them. Many combos and techniques are needed in high level play to take out higher level zeds and you always feel like there's room to improve. Most maps feel well balanced and most weapons feel unique.

With a game concept as simple as "survive as long as you can" you think it would get boring after a while. But it simply doesn't. This game is just addictive. buy it already.
OI, GET THIS GAME YEH WANKAH IT'S BLOODY SMASHING
Nice to see this game still populated these days, it's fun to hop in every now and then and blast some patriarch away, especially with friends.

Ahh. This game is SO fun to play. Lot of good weapons even WITHOUT those DLC options and lot of action and gore each game. One thing is bit bad here: Standard fights are too repetive here. You get waves of enemies and then 1 boss enemy. This game should have more those objective missions where you need to do certain things to get game completed. Still my score is 10/10

Killing Floor 2 is nowhere near as good as the original. Stick together or die alone in KF1, and you will die. The gibbing, the gore, plentiful weapons, great sounds, lack of trading floor, the enemies you are actually afraid of..this is how killing floor is supposed to be. I'd pick it up ASAP if you don't already have it, the graphics might appear dated but once you get playing, it doesn't really matter.

I don't even own this game, I am not kiding.


EDIT: I have the game, it's amazing.

In this game you're supposed to visit the store around the corner called LIDL.
You and your squad have one objective : Find and destroy the milk.
While running through the street you have to dodge filthy midgets with crossbows and smoke grenades beware of the huge worms which look like a huge worm don't say I didn't warn you!

[spoiler]DOSH GRAB IT WHILE YOU CAN LADS[/spoiler]

[h1]British Metal Zombie Killers [/h1] 
TL;DR 
Killing Floor is a Fantastic wave based shooter with challenging gameplay , humorous dialogue and a head banging soundtrack. You and 4 teammates will be pit against the bowels of hell as an array of monsters come to tear your nipples off. Using specialized classes with the weapons you purchase you will help each other to survive by strategic placement or running around like lunatics, that have been given to much sugar.


Follow us here 
Steamship Discord: https://discord.gg/XbsKrtK
Steamship Steam group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/thesteamship

Pros 
[list] 
[*]Fast paced
[*]Great Co-op experience
[*]Rocking Soundtrack
[*]Easy for Newcomers
[/list]

Cons 
[list]
[*]Lacking a variety in gameplay
[*]No story
[*]Levels do not change any gameplay
[/list]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h1] Gameplay[/h1]
In Killing floor choosing a class sets your playstyle for the match, your either going to be running around and keeping you distance or participating in fisticuffs. The game has very little strategy involved other than find a corner and only kill the last zombie when you‚Äôre at the merchant. Even though There are numerous types of monsters and weapons, you‚Äôll find yourself buying the same guns every game, the game sadly can become repetitive in its gameplay.


[h1] Characters[/h1] 
While there are no actual characters with a full-fledged story, the dialogue is delightfully British and witty, with funny quips and spammable taunts. There are roughly 100 character skins to choose from , most are just silly military skins but others are refrences like the tf2 pyro.

[h1] Art/Graphics [/h1]
Killing floor has that gritty film look and it pulls it off so well , with the dark environments and array of characters and monsters. The small maps usually follow a theme and they all give off a feeling of horror.
There are many character models to choose form and variants of the monsters, Yet they all seem to fit nicely in the level themes, Even the Christmas ones are very well made.



If you like this join us here to get the latest Reviews:

Steamship Discord: https://discord.gg/XbsKrtK
Steamship Steam group : http://steamcommunity.com/groups/thesteamship

What would you like to see for our next review ? Ask in the comment section!

I've played a lot of Killing Floor and I honestly could not give you a reason why. All of it is the same wave-based zombie survival game, but with a different environment depending on the map you're on. That being said, get a group of friends and just relax and enjoy some violence. The maps are well designed, and you can even download community made ones. Gameplay is solid with pretty decent weapon animations and bullets actually go where you aim them.
Un juegaso al principio lo jugaba pirata con unos amigos , pero al comprarlo despues dejaron de jugarlo. que hdp :v
This game is dead in China, do not buy it.

[h1][b]"O verdadeiro significado de co-op. N√£o h√° qualquer chance de sobreviver sem trabalhar em grupo"[/b][/h1]


[h1]+ Pontos Positivos[/h1]
[list]
    [*]√ìtima jogabilidade.

    [*]ZEDtime, dando um maior impacto as mortes.

    [*]Total incentivo ao cooperativo, √© quase imposs√≠vel sobreviver a uma partida n√≠vel hard ou Hell on Earth sem a ajuda do time.
    [*]Boa variedades de classes (Perks).
    [*]Totalmente configur√°vel, o jogo permite que os jogadores escolham o n√≠vel da partida, n√∫mero de hordas, mapas entre outros.
    [*]Suporte ao SteamWorkshop, possibilitando baixar mapas, armas e outros ZEDs.
    [*]Mais de 200 conquistas, rendendo horas de jogatina.
    [*]Gr√°ficos surpreendentes para um jogo da √©poca, conquistando jogadores mesmo nos tempos atuais.
    [*]Patriarch...
[/list]


[h1]- Pontos Negativos[/h1]
[list]
    [*]DLC's com pre√ßos altos.
    [*]Requer outros jogos da desenvolvedora para desbloquear itens.
    [*]Poucos modos de jogo oficiais, apenas dois.
    [*]N√£o h√° forma f√°cil de criar servidores.
[/list]

[h1]Concluindo, vale a pena adquirir esse jogo?[/h1]
Sim, sim e sim! Os servidores est√£o ativos at√© hoje, incluindo alguns nacionais com √≥timos ping. Se quer divers√£o e por um bom pre√ßo, compre essa delicia.
